mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM homeStay WHERE homeStayNum IN (SELECT distinct homeStayNum FROM homeStay JOIN homeStayDetail ON homeStay.homeStayNum=homeStayDetail.homeStayNum AND homeStay.approval=2 AND homeStay.open=1 AND homeStay.addr1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND homeStayDetail.maxPeople>=#{maxPeople}
AND homeStay.homeStayNum NOT IN (SELECT distinct homeStayReservation.homeStayNum FROM homeStayReservation WHERE (homeStayReservation.approval=2
AND homeStayReservation.checkOutDay>#{checkInDay} AND homeStayReservation.checkInDay<=#{checkInDay})
OR (homeStayReservation.approval=2
AND homeStayReservation.checkOutDay>=#{checkOutDay} AND homeStayReservation.checkInDay<#{checkOutDay})
))
SELECT min(homeStayPhotoNum) FROM homeStay JOIN homeStayPhoto ON homeStay.homeStayNum=homeStayPhoto.homeStayNum WHERE homeStay.homeStayNum=#{homeStayNum}
SELECT photoName FROM homeStayPhoto WHERE homeStayPhotoNum=#{homeStayPhotoNum}
SELECT count(*) FROM homeStayMark WHERE homeStayNum=#{homeStayNum} AND loginNum=#{loginNum}
SELECT * FROM homeStay WHERE approval=0 ORDER BY homeStayNum ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{perPage}
SELECT count(*) FROM homeStay WHERE approval=0
UPDATE homeStay SET approval=2 WHERE homeStayNum=#{homeStayNum}
UPDATE homeStay SET approval=1 WHERE homeStayNum=#{homeStayNum}
